densematrixmodule Module Reference

This (currently under construction) module allows one to convert a sparse matrix to a dense matrix. It also supports dense the dense versions of core matrix routines. This module will be used in situations where matrices become too dense for good sparse matrix performance. More...

Detailed Description

This (currently under construction) module allows one to convert a sparse matrix to a dense matrix. It also supports dense the dense versions of core matrix routines. This module will be used in situations where matrices become too dense for good sparse matrix performance.
